Title: C# MVC3 Web CCTV
Description:
The WEB CCTV project allows a remote connection & control of video cameras.
If a PTZ camera (Pelco-D, Visca, etc) is connected, a full pan/tilt/zoom/preset/etc command interface is available.

SImple webcams (including Kinect) can also be used.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The WEB CCTV project allows a remote connection & control of video cameras.
If a PTZ camera (Pelco-D, Visca, etc) is connected, a full pan/tilt/zoom/preset/etc command interface is available.

SImple webcams (including Kinect) can also be used.
